samples.context: Frequently when a team practices together often, they develop strong chemistry. When a team has good chemistry, they tend to perform better in games.
samples.question: Does it entail that for the local basketball team, if they practice together often, they will perform better in games?

samples.context: When a person consistently eats healthy foods, they tend to have more energy throughout the day. Having more energy enables them to exercise regularly.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Michael, if he consistently eats healthy foods, he will exercise regularly?

samples.context: When a person starts a new workout routine, they usually feel sore for the first few sessions as their body adjusts. With consistent practice over time, the soreness typically gives way to increased strength and endurance.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Mark, given that he starts a new workout routine, he will gain strength and endurance?

samples.context: In many cases, when a student studies hard for an exam, they feel well prepared when it's time to take the test. Feeling prepared gives them confidence, which allows them to perform well on the exam.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Emily, if she studies hard for an exam, she will perform well on it?

samples.context: When someone starts exercising regularly, they often find themselves having more energy during the day. With this extra energy, they realize that they are able to focus better and be more productive at work.
samples.question: Does it entail that for John, if he starts exercising regularly, he will be more productive at work?

samples.context: In general, when someone exercises consistently, they become more fit over time. As they become more fit, their health tends to improve in various ways.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Jane, if she exercises consistently, her health will improve?

samples.context: Frequently, when someone consistently eats healthy foods, they tend to have high energy levels each day. Consequently, having high daily energy leads people to be more productive in their work.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Jane, given that she consistently eats healthy foods, she will be more productive at work?

samples.context: If someone waters their plants regularly, the plants will stay healthy and thrive. When the plants are thriving, the garden will appear lush and beautiful.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Mary, if she waters her plants regularly, her garden will appear lush and beautiful?

samples.context: Often when someone purchases a used car, they soon discover it needs unexpected repairs. Needing unexpected repairs causes frustration for the owner.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Sara, if she purchases a used car, she will feel frustrated?

samples.context: Often when someone moves to a new city, it takes time for them to build a social circle and feel connected. However, putting themselves out there and joining groups helps them eventually establish meaningful friendships.
samples.question: Does it entail that for Sarah, given that she moves to a new city, she will establish meaningful friendships?
